instructions: # Fate Core Character Sheet with rolls and creation per line skills list.## That is an improuvment of the previous release, it has now a choice to give you a default skill array, or create your array line per line as you need.Based on previous Fate Core Sheet by Andrew Bailey (krathognis) and Devindra Payment (@Ardnived)##**If you use this sheet instead of the old one there will be no data lost**
